import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Booking=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({date:'',time:'',guests:1});const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setMessage('');try{const response=await fetch('/api/bookings',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({customer_id:1,// Replace with logged-in user ID from authentication
date:formData.date,time:formData.time,party_size:formData.guests})});const result=await response.json();if(response.ok){setMessage('Booking confirmed!');}else{setMessage(result.error||'Failed to confirm booking.');}}catch(err){setMessage('An unexpected error occurred.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"booking-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Book Your Table"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",name:"date",value:formData.date,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Time"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",name:"time",value:formData.time,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Guests"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"guests",value:formData.guests,onChange:handleChange,min:"1",required:true})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Confirm Booking"})]})]});};export default Booking;
